posts.title: The Ultimate Guide to Salty Recipes
posts.author: John Doe
posts.content: Explore some of the most delicious salty meals from around the world. From fried chicken to lasagna, we've got it all!

posts.title: Mozzarella Sticks: The Perfect Snack
posts.author: Jane Smith
posts.content: These mozzarella sticks are the perfect crispy snack. Learn how to make them from scratch and impress your guests.

posts.title: How to Make the Best Pepperoni Pizza
posts.author: Chef Mark
posts.content: Master the art of pizza-making with this simple yet delicious pepperoni pizza recipe. A crispy crust with just the right amount of spice!
